A6020.changelog:
- Blacklisted google hotword service to fix mic issues
- Enabled audiosphere effect by default
- Fixed FM radio
- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

X00T.changelog:
- Fixed dark camera issue in whatsapp and telegram
- Fixed random charging issues

X01AD.changelog:
Reduce Speaker volume for safety
Address Smart Charge Denials

X01BD.changelog:
* 4.4.262 kernel upstreamed
* Fixed haptic vibration
* Dropped ZenParts

beryllium.changelog:
- Enable ZRAM (3Gb, lz4 compress algorithm)
- Enable H/W Composition
- Enable UBWC aligned framebuffer
- Enable Codec2 support
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

chiron.changelog:
- Update GCAM to Wyroczens release
- Import ft5x46 support for jdi display

cmi.changelog:
! ! ! Firmware and vendor require update to V12.2.4.0.RJACNXM.

- Fix jagged cutout
- Support WeChat fingerprint payment
- Audio Improve
- Adjust the height of the status bar
- Improve haptic and vibe patterns
- Enable call recording

davinci.changelog:
16/03/2021
- Fixed System UI crash after opening the in-app fingerprint dialog
- Various other minor bug fixes and improvements
25/02/2021
-Fixed missing signal until a few minutes pass after boot
15/02/2021
-Fixed FOD after WFD (the screen will bright up for recognizing the fingerprint after using WFD, but works. A reboot will restore the normal behaviour as usual)
-Switched to perf kernel
-Updated blobs to MIUI 21.2.3

Notes:
- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

gauguin.changelog:
- Fixed d2w
- Fixed refresh rate preference values
- More misc changes/fixes

ginkgo.changelog:
- Updated stock blobs from MIUI 21.3.3
- Updated CAF blobs from LA.UM.9.11.r1-02800-NICOBAR.0
- Updated redfin fp to march (fixed safetynet)
- Fixed camera freeze in some social media apps
- Fixed camera lens switching delay
- Fixed voip/mic issues in some apps
- KCAL improvements in xiaomi parts
- Added vibration strength control in xiaomi parts
- Made notch cutout wider/smoother
- Switched to new QTI thermal HAL
- Attempted to fix screen blackouts under sunlight/heat
- Disabled KPTI for performance improvement
- Reduced readahead to 128kB to improve storage performance
- GPS config optimizations and fixes
- Tuned cpusets for better performance
- Improved rounded corners and fixed hide cutout option
- Switched to android userspace LMKD
- Added support for willow hwversion 18.31.0
- Improved zram read/write performance
- Switched to QuicksilveR v2.5 kernel
- Merged LA.UM.9.1.r1-09100-SMxxx0.0 CAF and v4.14.223 in kernel
- Fast charging on chinese ginkgo variants maybe fixed
- Misc optimizations and fixes

lavender.changelog:
- Redfin FP for March ASB
- Patch WFD libs (TEST Cast)

lmi.changelog:
- Firmware and vendor require V12.2.1.0.RJKCNXM.

- Device: https://github.com/ArrowOS-Devices/android_device_xiaomi_lmi/commits/arrow-11.0
- Blobs: https://github.com/ArrowOS-Devices/android_vendor_xiaomi_lmi/commits/arrow-11.0

miatoll.changelog:
• Kernel upstream to 4.14.224
• Merged latest tag LA.UM.9.1.r1-09100-SMxxx0.0
• Added dynamic thermal profile implementation
• Added GPU boost in Xiaomiparts
• Fixed fast charge toggle icon tint in dark themes in Xiaomiparts
• Set fast charging indicator threshold to 10.8W
• Fixed weird glitches with gestures sometimes
• Fix mic issues in apps like Whatsapp
• Properly fixed google voice recorder voice recordings

mido.changelog:
Note:
- These are still going to continue on 3.18 builds only.
- Requests for 4.9 builds will be ignored.

This decision has been taken as per the equal no.of requests from both sides of the parties and concluded by the outcome of adverse performance affects.

perseus.changelog:
- Enable ZRAM (3Gb, lz4 compress algorithm)
- Enable H/W Composition
- Enable UBWC aligned framebuffer
- Enable Codec2 support
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- It is required firmware part MIUI Q CN (Example V12.0.3.0.QEECNXM).

phoenix.changelog:
- Kernel upstreamed to 4.14.214
- light: Properly scale brightness range
- light: Avoid uint32_t underflow
- decrease in-call volume a bit

polaris.changelog:
- Enable ZRAM (3Gb, lz4 compress algorithm)
- Enable H/W Composition
- Enable UBWC aligned framebuffer
- Enable Codec2 support
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!
- From now on it is required to be on Q firmware (11.0.3.0 global or more new)

raphael.changelog:
- Misc changes and fixes

Note:
- Requires the latest MIUI Q vendor and firmware.

sanders.changelog:
Clean flash must (kindly backup your data before flashing)
improved  performance
Enabled ZRAM by default
Tuned ZRAM for better performance
Compiled with hwui for better performance
Switched to Mad Kernel 2.0

surya.changelog:
- parts: Implement auto-lowering refresh rate on battery saver
- parts: Add touch profiles for gaming and benchmarking
- parts: Add dirac QS tile
- parts: Introduce Refresh Rate QS tile
- Remove libcameraservice shim
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Unified builds

umi.changelog:
Firmware and vendor require lastest MIUI Stable V12.2.10

- Update blobs from MIUI Stable V12.2.10
- Fix jagged cutout
- Support Alipay and WeChat fingerprint payment
- Audio Improve
- Adjust the height of the status bar
- Improve haptic and vibe patterns
- Enable call recording
